scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm -w backend run dev" "npm -w frontend run dev"
scripts.build: npm -w backend run build && npm -w frontend run build
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm -w backend run start" "npm -w frontend run start"
scripts.typecheck: npm -w backend run typecheck && npm -w frontend run typecheck
